page.title: 05Pubs in Braunton.
page.content: Most of the public houses in Braunton date from the{18th or 19th century. Here is a list of most of them:The London Inn,The Agricultural Inn,The Mariners Arms,White Lion,The George, The New Inn,The Black Horse and The Williams Arms.{The Mariners}is so called because all the master mariners used to drink there.{The {London Inn}is named because it is situated on the old main road to London.{The New Inn}is probably the oldest pub.Any pub called the New Inn probably goes back to the days of Queen Elizabeth the 1st.Inns were then introduced as places where you could drink,eat and stay the night.This was a new thing and thus they were called New Inns.{The Agricutural}was named after the farming business, and the farmers who probably used it on market days.
